posts.name: Jane Doe
posts.title: Associate Director, Business Operations at RateYaBoss.com
posts.author: anonymous

comments.body: The only reason I keep this job is because he pays me well.
I had to take off work to take care of my husband, so he convinced my husband I was cheating on him.
One time, she came in to the office wearing a lime green pantsuit.
She fired me because I called her headband ugly, and only gave me one month of severance pay.
